NF.Q: In the column Farming of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 6680? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Seeding} has an outflow of {9179}, {Seeding} has an outflow of {12190}, {Fertilization} has an outflow of {7386}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Farming and column Import & Export is the flow between 3018 and 8282? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {7386} from node {Fertilization} to {Export Certification}, a flow of {3935} from node {Fertilization} to {Import Inspection}, a flow of {5975} from node {Fertilization} to {International Shipping}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 4101 and 4443? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {4240} from node {Wholesale} to {Packaging}, a flow of {4107} from node {Transportation} to {Packaging}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Packaging to node Fertilization and from node Storage to node Packaging, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Packaging} to node {Fertilization} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Transportation to node Cleaning, from node Cleaning to node Seeding, and from node Fertilization to node Import Inspection, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Cleaning} to node {Seeding} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Wholesale to node Canning, from node Storage to node Cleaning, and from node Seeding to node International Shipping, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Seeding} to node {International Shipping} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Distribution of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Transportation to target node Export Certification? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Transportation to node Export Certification is: {Transportation, Packaging, Seeding, Export Certification}.
